after.title: Add 'next' command to start working on available issues
after.body:
## Summary
Add a new `bb next` command that automatically selects an available, unblocked issue and starts working on it.

## Behavior
- Find issues that are ready (not blocked, dependencies satisfied)
- Optionally filter by labels, assignee, or other criteria  
- Apply the 'start' shortcut (In Progress status, assign to @me)
- Output the selected issue details

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Command `bb next` implemented
- [ ] Follows dry-run pattern (requires -x to execute)
- [ ] Uses existing ready-issue detection logic
- [ ] Integrates with shortcut system
